 2017-03362017-04-12,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActFinancial Administration Act
Precisre-appointment of PAUL JOHN GRIFFIN of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of Marine Atlantic Inc. to hold office during pleasure, for a term of one year or until such time as a new president and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective May 3, 2017.
